meanings.definition: The quality or state of being showy.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit had a lot of showiness with all the sparkles and sequins.
meanings.sent2: The peacock's feathers displayed an impressive showiness.
meanings.sent3: The showiness of the birthday cake made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The showiness of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The showiness of the parade left a lasting impression on the spectators.

meanings.definition: The act of showing off or displaying in a flashy or ostentatious manner.
meanings.sent1: His showiness at the party was hard to miss with his loud laughter and extravagant gestures.
meanings.sent2: The celebrity's showiness on the red carpet attracted a lot of attention.
meanings.sent3: The peacock's showiness made the other birds jealous.
meanings.sent4: The showiness of the magician's tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The showiness of the sports car turned heads as it zoomed by.
